registerStep1.title: Register
registerStep1.subtitle: Section 1: Registration type.
registerStep1.description: To open your account, please choose the registration type.

registerStep2.title: Register
registerStep2.subtitle: Section 2: Contact Information.
registerStep2.description: Enter your email address for account notifications and recovery.
registerStep2.policy-description: I have read and fully understand the contents of this document:
registerStep2.email-exists: An account is already associated with this email address.

registerStep3.title: Register
registerStep3.subtitle: Section 3: Email verification.
registerStep3.description: Enter the verification code we just sent to your email address.
registerStep3.counter-alert: If you haven't received an email by the time the timer expires, please request a new email below.
registerStep3.counter-error: Now you're able to request a new email.
registerStep3.counter-alert-2: You will be able to request a new code once it expires.

registerStep4.title: Register
registerStep4.subtitle: Section 4: Password set up.
registerStep4.description: Please create a password and confirm it below to continue.
registerStep4.password-no-match: Passwords do not match. Please try again.

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Login to continue using the app.
login.email-no-exists: No email associated with this account. Please try again.

recoveryPasswordStep1.title: Password Recovery
recoveryPasswordStep1.subtitle: Section 1: Contact Information.
recoveryPasswordStep1.description: Enter your email address for account recovery.
recoveryPasswordStep1.email-no-exists: We couldn't find an account with that email address. Please check your email address and try again.
recoveryPasswordStep1.email-exists: An account is already associated with this email address.

recoveryPasswordStep2.title: Password Recovery
recoveryPasswordStep2.subtitle: Section 2: Email verification.
recoveryPasswordStep2.description: Enter the verification code we just sent to your email address.
recoveryPasswordStep2.counter-alert: If you haven't received an email by the time the timer expires, please request a new email below.
recoveryPasswordStep2.counter-error: Now you're able to request a new email.
recoveryPasswordStep2.counter-alert-2: You will be able to request a new code once it expires.

recoveryPasswordStep3.title: Password Recovery
recoveryPasswordStep3.subtitle: Section 3: Password set up.
recoveryPasswordStep3.description: Please create a new password and confirm it below to continue.
recoveryPasswordStep3.password-no-match: Passwords do not match. Please try again.

onBoarding.description-step-1: We are a global financial platform with licenses in fiat currency and cryptocurrencies.
onBoarding.description-step-2: Our financial licenses allow us to offer local and international services
onBoarding.description-step-3: We manage secure and efficient transactions with Mastercard
